nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.rest

Class GeneralRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.rest.BaseRestController
      • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.rest.GeneralRestController

  • @Controller
public class GeneralRestController
extends BaseRestController
    Controller which handles /general paths. This is the only REST service which runs without authentication.
    Author:
    luis
